author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Sascha Rodekamp "Fix Portal Drag'n'Drop" (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-4062) - OFBIZ-4062
During the last works on the my portal module, the Drag'n'Drop functionality was lost. Here is a fix which enables the Drag'n'Drop again.

author: mor
msg: Bug fix - Added group-by clause on OrderPaymentPreference.statusId field on OrderPurchasePaymentSummary view so that the max amount is summed up according to the status.

author: eric
msg: Add h2 and derby dependencies for functional test run (MAILBOX-28)

author: clement
msg: Avoid cleaning registration maps when an instance is disposed. This avoids the injection of null when a callback is called after the instance destruction.
